ErrUnknownText: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened on our server. We are working to resolve the issue as soon as possible.
ErrForbiddenText: We're sorry, but you do not have permission to perform this action. Please check your credentials.
ErrNotAvailableText: To complete this process, please verify your email address by clicking the link we've sent to your email.
ErrUnauthorizedText: For your security, 2FA is required to access your account. Please enter the 6-code generated by your 2FA app.
ErrInvalidFormatText: We're sorry, but the format of one or more parameters is invalid. Please ensure that your username and password meet the required format and try again.
ErrWrongCredentialsText: We're sorry, but the username or password you entered is incorrect. Please check your credentials and try again.
ErrInvalidPassword: A password must be at least 8 characters long, including at least one uppercase letter, one lowercase letter, one number, and one special character.
ErrFetchingProfileText: We're sorry, but we were unable to load your profile information at this time. Please try again later or contact our support team if the issue persists.
